text: Timothy Carlton Congdon Cumberbatch (born 4 October 1939), known professionally as Timothy Carlton, is an English actor. He is best known for his sitcom roles in Executive Stress, Keeping Up Appearances and Next of Kin. His best known movie roles are Baby Love (1968), The Breaking of Bumbo (1970), That Lucky Touch (1975), High Road to China (1983) and Parting Shots (1999). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1939 births Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Berkshire Category:Actors from Oxfordshire
title: Timothy Carlton
